title: Oh look.Eve's getting nerfed again.
body:
Never saw it coming.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ObpcGNCU944


Seriously though... why? I haven't even seen an Evelynn in over a month, including in ARAM and Twisted Treeline. Was her mana pool just too high to allow a costless spell in a game where Katarina, Garen, Cassiopeia, Darius, Riven, Diana, Shyvana, Gnar, Elise, Nunu, Vladimir, Annie, Xerath, Sivir, Lee Sin, Nidalee, Jayce, Aatrox, Akali, Bard, Kennen, Mordekaiser, Lissandra, Leblanc, Rek'Sai, Renekton, Rengar, Rumble, Ryze, Shen, Veigar, Twisted Fate, Tryndamere, Yasuo, Zac, Zed and Kindred exist?
